text: MindGeek: The secretive owner of Pornhub and RedTube
As the world quieted down in 2020, Raspberry Shakes listened
Microsoft is reportedly added to the growing list of victims in SolarWinds hack
Moderna vaccine gets the thumbs-up for emergency use
Jeremy Bulloch, the original Boba Fett, has passed away
Google committed “antitrust evils,” colluded with Facebook, new lawsuit says
Tesla Cybertruck Hot Wheels toy ships late—just like real Tesla cars
SolarWinds hack that breached gov networks poses a “grave risk” to the nation
Twitter repeals retweet roadblocks, Facebook follows suit
Google kills Android Things, its IoT OS, in January
Looking into the genetics of severe COVID-19
“Simp,” “incel” part of newly banned insults on Twitch
China collects Moon samples, may not share with NASA due to Wolf Amendment
Amazon’s answer to SpaceX Starlink delivers 400Mbps in prototype phase
Don’t try this at home: George’s Marvelous Medicine is quite toxic
“Evil mobile emulator farms” used to steal millions from US and EU banks
HBO Max patches its Roku hole six months after launch
Qualcomm promises three years of Android updates for its entire SoC lineup
Google bought CloudReady, the largest ChromiumOS distribution
What makes The Expanse so great: Good science, balancing epic with personal
War Stories: How Nintendo sold the NES to a skeptical country
Up to 3 million devices infected by malware-laced Chrome and Edge add-ons
40 GirlsDoPorn victims sue Pornhub for hosting “sex trafficking” videos
Google sees major services outages two days in a row
Astra set up a rocket launch with five people and came within seconds of orbit
Bitcoin price passes $20,000, setting new record
Reminder: Donate to win swag in our annual Charity Drive sweepstakes
FDA authorizes use of a nonprescription home COVID test
FDA releases data on Moderna’s COVID vaccine: It looks good [Updated]
Uber defends sexual assault victims’ privacy, gets fined $59 million
Apple’s watchOS 7.2 is out, offers new health and fitness metrics
iPhone factory workers say they haven’t been paid, cause millions in damages
The Super-est SuperFX: An unmodified SNES, revved up with ray tracing [Updated]
Alan Tudyk plays a crime-solving alien in disguise in Resident Alien trailer
The Orion spacecraft is now 15 years old and has flown into space just once
Senator tries to block Frontier’s FCC funding, citing ISP’s various failures
Canada set to raise carbon price considerably over next decade
CDPR admits it “ignored the signals” of Cyberpunk 2077’s console issues
